NOTICE:
MTK MP3 Decoder is fully compliant to MPEG-1/ MPPEG-2/ MPEG-2.5 Audio Layer II and III standards.
The decoder output format is signed PCM 16-bit and provide high audio quality (conformance test with ISO/IEC 11172-4, RMS <=-101.10 dB).
The library, libmp3dec.a, is built and can be linked already.
For people who may like to use these APIs, just includes mp3dec_common.h and mp3dec_exp.h, and see the definitions in header file.
